title: Jaycoinz
author: Jaycoinz
content: Am so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services. ¬† ¬† This forum has taught me a lot on which I need to know most especially on how Bitcoin can be save. Such as¬† Hardware wallet¬† Electrum wallet¬† Soft and hot wallet.¬† ¬†I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure.¬† Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency.and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: Better version of your post:Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PMAm so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services.¬† This forum has taught me a lot on which I need to know most especially on how Bitcoin can be save, such as:- Hardware wallet- Electrum wallet- Soft and hot wallet.I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure. Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.I also feel the same way, although i haven't gotten to the trading side yet. But the people here are really very helpful for a newbie like me. Response below as an example:Quote from: Lucius on February 01, 2023, 04:45:20 PMThere are faucets and various PTCs that give a small reward for completing a task, but these rewards are very low considering their fiat value. Those who earn from such jobs are usually people who are owners or those users who have a lot of referrals (active of course). I recommend that you visit Micro Earnings board, and there, among other things, you can see my thread with a link that might help you in your search You talked about candlesticks and market structure. Where do you read general topics about this in this forum? i also want to read it.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: If you intend more information then this forum will provide it as long as you can search and explore further or ask something that doesn't yet exist about cryptocurrencies then here will be more information from various parties from their assumptions and still we should be able to benefit from them about the conclusion.Use a wallet that has a private key or what is called a seed phrase because this will be completely under our own control, never put your hopes on the exchange about assets there, it will be more risky to store there.But I'm glad to know you how to use hardware wallet and hot wallet.I will provide more threads which are summarized in one thread by Ratimov, maybe this will be useful for you because there will teach you more, starting from beginners to being able to understand it.[1] Beginners & Help Encyclopedia

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM¬† Am so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services. ¬† ¬† This forum has taught me a lot on which I need to know most especially on how Bitcoin can be save. Such as¬† Hardware wallet¬† Electrum wallet¬† Soft and hot wallet.¬† ¬†I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure.¬† Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency.and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.Yes, if you feel you are benefited and already gain a good knowledge above things then yeah this forum is for you and people like you. I am saying this because a lot of portion of new comers are just come here to earn money by doing bounty or other task. They don't even know how the crypto work, even how to make transactions.But you are too different from others. And trying to learn more avout crypto for what actually the forum was created . Best of luck. Keep Continue the learning.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Hey, don't get to hype this whole shiiiii...  You don't have to do so in the name of making a post... I understand that it's really hard to cope with the standards in here since you're just getting started, but I'm certain that you've gone - a lil - far from being REAL.I was also wondering where you got a whole discussion thread about how candle sticks are being analyzed,etc..?? I would agree with you that you've learnt alot as you said, over the little time you've spent here, and if those informations have worked things out clearly for you, then it's a great deal that you got the forum as a reservoir of knowledge. We still have alot of people out there that trade Bitcoin but cannot do the least, technical stuff like signing a PGP.Sandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: I always love when people celebrate every little win and begining and I love the energy I'm feeling while reading your post. I wasn't a good writer neither was I a good reader or listener but ever since my membership with the forum, alot of things have changed for good ln my life and one of it is the patience it has instilled in me and the fact that everyone has an entirely different opinions from another on same topic and it has also help me not to be sentimental in passing out judgementsThe benefits of the forum can't be over emphasized but I think there are more positivity in the forum over negativity.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM¬† Am so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services. ¬† ¬† This forum has taught me a lot on which I need to know most especially on how Bitcoin can be save. Such as¬† Hardware wallet¬† Electrum wallet¬† Soft and hot wallet.¬† ¬†I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure.¬† Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency.and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.Actually, you can also learn all these things from other channels and platforms like Youtube and article sites but forum discussion is better because of the many ideas coming in that weigh the pros and the cons of the subject, compare to other platforms where the author is the only one giving you the knowledge but here you have many members giving you what they know and their experience and it's up to you how to evaluate them and accept it.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: That's good for you and congrats on what you've achieved. Just give some more precious time spent here reading and reading those important threads that usually it's pinned on the top. ¬†It gives valuable information it's either on crypto or general information here in the forum. When it comes to trading, it needs more technical stuff and I suggest don't rely on this forum, sometimes you need to explore outside or another source as needed.¬† Books or e-books for technical and fundamental analysis might work well. More reading than posting will give you more benefits.Good luck and see you around.

comments.author: Aliosky
comments.body: Thats one thing i love about this forum is that learning never ends no matter your rank here. I used to think there is nothing left for the higher ranks to learn that they‚Äôve acquired the required knowledge until i saw a senior member rank asking for guidance here. In as much as you are willing to learn you will keep learning here, my little time here i have learned somethings here and there is still a whole lot i want to know about but i believe with time i will get there

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM¬† Am so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services. ¬† ¬† This forum has taught me a lot on which I need to know most especially on how Bitcoin can be save. Such as¬† Hardware wallet¬† Electrum wallet¬† Soft and hot wallet.¬† ¬†I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure.¬† Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency.and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.There is no doubt that bitcointalk is a great forum that teaches cryptocurrency and also other technologies.Before I arrived this forum, I was thinking and approaching matters in a different level or ways but this very community unleashed one part of my life that I refused to use for a long time.Above all this forum taught me how to be very smart and assuming I knew this forum before 2020, I wouldn't have fallen prey to numerous scammers that brought me down as of then.This forum is now part of my life as I cherish it even more than my social media handles.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM~snip~ ¬†I have also gotten the knowledge on cryptocurrency trading there by how to study the candle sticks and market structure.¬† Again also on how to do transaction with cryptocurrency.and with this knowledge I have gotten from this forum I am proud to say things has been going well with me.Trading cannot be learned in a short time, it takes several processes to do. There are many more complete references outside this forum. Studying technical analysis and also fundamental analysis is highly recommended. if you study it you will understand how the market works.This forum provides benefits for many people who join and fully contribute to this forum. If you stay consistent in this forum by contributing a lot you will get a lot of benefits. Besides being able to rank up with some of the merits you get as a reward for your good posts, you can have the opportunity to take part in signature campaigns that pay in bitcoins or altcoins.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Your first forum unconscious learning achieved is the ability for you not to plagiarize, the forum perfectly groomed you on that, then teach you how to learn and earn respect on a professional standard, which is one of the reasons that if you post rubish you won't earn merit and your post may end up getting deleted, this automatically neans your growth as well is getting retarded if care is not taken, the forum has taught everyone iin one way or the other that specialize way of living among the people in a professional manner and integrity which also has caused the discovery of the values in you, that you may not be aware of having before joining this platform.

comments.author: armanda90
comments.body: Looks you come here in Bitcointalk forum not priority earn money trough joining bounties campaign but how do your push up your knowledge actually about many kinds of wallet from hardware, electrum until cold wallet. Each person have different reason why thy try joining in this forum and what benefit get later. No problem in this forum many benefit are waiting for you later not only about hardware wallet but also many kinds benefit here need explore on several board, but in board Beginner & help I got more education and know all thing about cryptocurrency from wallet kinds until understand basic from cryptocurrency exchange.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM¬† Am so excited to say that I really benefit from this forum in terms of cryptocurrency trading and other related services. The benefits this forum offers surpasses just Cryptocurrency trading and any other related services that you may mean. There is the benefit of community involvement which is also gotten here. Being a member of a community gives you a sense of belonging. Many people on this forum still buy and HODL bitcoins because of the encouragement they are getting knowing that there are other people like them here who are steadfastly holding on to what they have and making moves to have more. Also because of the benefit of free interaction here, you can easily get answers to concerns that you have about cryptocurrency with ease, that is a benefit too.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: useful or not will all depend on how you will do it. you think you've benefited enough from the information in the forums, so that's good for you because you're looking for what you need.the more you read, the more you will have the proper knowledge. you are already part of the forum, you are free to discuss or read the resources available. hope you are more successful.Most importantly, always try to read and understand the forum rules, it can make you better at carrying out your activities on the forum.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 02, 2023, 03:23:35 PM<snip>It's nice that you mentioned what you¬† aim to look at. Since you specified it, here is the board all related to wallets: Wallet software. Hardware wallet topics are included to that board. Check it out. You can raise your concern if you have any. Welcome and good luck

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Good that you have came to know about good stuff from the forum like Electrum wallets but the advice is to keep your funds in them and not use any centralised exchange for safety of your funds.For non custodial wallets Electrum is definitely a good choice but remember to keep your seed phrase safe at some offline storage.Just some add on tips on wallets choices for you.But happy to see that this forum has benefited you in lot many ways but keep exploring more useful threads which can help you in more ways as it has helped lot of us who came here as newbie but now have good knowledge to share with others.The best part of forum is exchange of knowledge among each other.

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Quote from: Pandu Geddon on February 03, 2023, 02:01:13 PMuseful or not will all depend on how you will do it. you think you've benefited enough from the information in the forums, so that's good for you because you're looking for what you need.the more you read, the more you will have the proper knowledge. you are already part of the forum, you are free to discuss or read the resources available. hope you are more successful.Most importantly, always try to read and understand the forum rules, it can make you better at carrying out your activities on the forum.There are so many things that the forum has taught and helped one in achieving especially while constantly reading and commenting on people's posts,it is unarguably true that bitcointalk forum is more educative when it comes to trading.There are so many experienced people in the forum who are teaching and making posts out of experience in all the different boards.The forum has taught me how to trade without expecting so much loss.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: This forum I will gladly say that is the best forum I have even in to,the way the do attend to newbies here and how they do address issues has really been so helpful to me.It was from this forum a learnt how to invest in bitcoin and know much about cypto as well.Having a good reputation and good behavior of every individual here they teach and make you understand what bitcoin is all about and the risky that implies.They have really been the luckiest person to have embraced this forum I really has benefited alot here.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Good to hear that mate, now you are knowledgeable through this forum, Yes this forum help us to under stand what we are aiming to know. All we need is to search and find that information to became a knowledgeable. Also that's a good that you learn about wallets like Electrum, hardware and software wallets which is very useful interms of you want to store crypto. Just do what other said above that do not share your seed phrase as we all know how important it is.
